metadataAttributes.Title: Investment Banking: M&A and Initial Public Offerings
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course focuses on examining various practical applications of the fundamental financial analysis and valuation techniques employed in the investment banking industry.  Specifically, we will examine how to analyze how a private equity firm or other financial sponsor completes a leveraged buyout of a company, how a public company analyzes the impact of acquiring a company on its earnings per share, and how a company completes an initial public offering.
